Source code for maxaimodel.spark.clustering.spark_kmeans

import json
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
from copy import deepcopy

from maxaibase.model.spark.spark_clustering import SparkClusteringBaseModel
from maxairesources.factory.model_factory import ModelFactory
import pyspark
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
import pyspark.sql.functions as F
import pyspark.sql.types as T

from pyspark.ml.clustering import (
    KMeans,
    KMeansModel,
)



[docs]@ModelFactory.register_model("SparkKMeansClustering")
class SparkKMeansClustering(SparkClusteringBaseModel):
    def __init__(self, params, path = ""):
        if path:
            self.load(path)
        else:
            self.build(params)


[docs]    def build(self, params):
        self.model = KMeans(**params)



[docs]    def optimise_k(self, k, data):
        if k == 0:
            cluster_range = range(4, 10)
            cost = np.zeros(10)
            
            for k_val in cluster_range:
                model_set = self.model.setK(k_val)
                model = model_set.fit(data.sample(False, 0.1, seed=42))
                cost[k_val] = model.computeCost(data)  # requires Spark 2.0 or later
                
            k = np.where(cost == np.amin(cost[cluster_range]))[0][0]
        
        self.model = self.model.setK(k).fit(data)        

               

[docs]    def load(self, path):
        self.model = KMeansModel.load(path)
